description: Stone base texture with reddish-brown iron ore deposits and veins

base_colors.note: Stone base color identical to regular stone: r = 110 + ironStoneBase * 25

vein_detection.note: Iron veins appear when ironVeinFactor > 0.7, different frequencies than coal for variety

vein_size_calculation.note: Vein appears when veinSize > 0.6, slightly higher frequency than coal (0.9 vs 0.8)

iron_colors.formula: r = 160 + veinSize * 40 (range: 160-200), g = 110 + veinSize * 20 (range: 110-130), b = 70 + veinSize * 10 (range: 70-80)
iron_colors.note: Reddish-brown iron ore colors with strong red component

light_specks.description: Reddish-brown iron ore deposits with organic distribution

patterns.note: Primary iron ore pattern - slightly different from coal
Tertiary iron ore pattern for realistic distribution

color_adjustment.note: Transform stone color to reddish-brown iron ore (stone ~135 -> iron ~190/140/90)

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate stone base noise: sin(x*0.8 + y*0.2)*0.3 + cos(x*0.3 + y*0.7)*0.3 + sin((x+y)*0.5)*0.4
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply stone base colors: r = 110 + ironStoneBase * 25, g = 110 + ironStoneBase * 25, b = 115 + ironStoneBase * 25
generation_algorithm.step4: Calculate iron vein factor: ironVeinFactor = sin(x * 1.2 + y * 1.3) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step5: If ironVeinFactor > 0.7, calculate vein size: veinSize = sin((x + y) * 0.9) * 0.3 + 0.7
generation_algorithm.step6: If veinSize > 0.6, replace with iron colors: r = 160 + veinSize * 40, g = 110 + veinSize * 20, b = 70 + veinSize * 10
generation_algorithm.step7: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Two-stage generation: identical stone base + iron ore vein overlay

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded IRON_ORE texture algorithm

validation_notes.pattern_complexity: Triple noise stone base with dual-condition iron vein system
validation_notes.coordinate_system: Uses global coordinates for consistent mineral distribution
